greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of n that are smaller than sqrt(n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: di[x_] := Divisors[x] lds[x_] := Ceiling[DivisorSigma[0, x]/2] rd[x_] := Reverse[Divisors[x]] td[x_] := Table[Part[rd[x], w], {w, 1, lds[x]}] sud[x_] := Apply[Plus, td[x]] Table[DivisorSigma[1, w]-sud[w], {w, 1, 128}]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 19 2002
